name: @grain-analytics/web
description: Lightweight TypeScript SDK for sending analytics events to Grain's REST API

scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:iife
scripts.build:esm: tsc --module esnext --target es2020 --outDir dist/esm && mv dist/esm/index.js dist/index.mjs
scripts.build:cjs: tsc --module commonjs --target es2020 --outDir dist/cjs && mv dist/cjs/index.js dist/index.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Grain Analytics
